quotes.author: JK Rowling
quotes.quote: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.

quotes.author: Steven Jobs
quotes.quote: Your time on this earht is limited, don't live someone else's ;ife, live by your vision.

quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.quote: I never had a policty, I have tired to do my very best and every day.

quotes.author: Irving Berlin
quotes.quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it and 90 percent how you take it.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.quote: I know nothing except the fact of my ignorance

quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi
quotes.quote: Every home is a university and the parents are the teachers

quotes.author: Arsitotle
quotes.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
